title: Ranked Dodgeing
body: I find myself constantly having to dodge my ranked games probably something like 1 in 5 because there is somebody saying fk u im feeding or something. It would be awesome if they made something where you could vote to dodge and pick a player for a reason to dodge and nobody gets a que timer apart from the person that was voted.

replies.body: That's a good system for ranked.. Good idea.

So lets put in something where we can all just pick a person and force them to dodge even if it's not their fault.

That sounds logical.

Last pick is now the "your being forced to dodge" player as well as the last pick player.

inb4 first picks constantly get kicked for picking mid/jungle by the other 3-4 mid/jungle mains in the lobby

also i've played almost 200 ranked games this season on OCE and I've only had 1 person saying they will feed in pregame lobby, that shit usually starts 10 minutes into the game
well isnt it possible to dodge lets just say someone took your role or you check there score stats and you see that he has a terrible kda and you dodge.
How bout you all vote to dodge and each take a smaller penalty? Seems like the only sensible way to do something like this
or you could just deal with that player being on your and carry their a$$

Yeah but it could also be used to dodge unfavourable enemy team compositions etcetera.

I find a lot of these games are demoralizing but bear in mind that person wont be climbing ranked any time soon - or may just be in an off mood and play decently if you are matched with them again. I also find a lot of the time people that say stuff like that usually shape up and do perform in game despite threats.
I think this is a good idea, but i dont like giving someone at que timer. i think you should be put in low priority if people were to voted continually.
ill just duo queue and both vote no gg
there are soo many people threatening to feed and stuff like that and i do not want to be stuck with it
